text: Hai Jawani Toh Ishq Hona Hai (; shortened as HJTIHH) is an upcoming Indian Hindi-language romantic comedy movie directed by David Dhawan and produced by Tips Films. Based on an original story by Dhawan, the movie stars Varun Dhawan, Pooja Hegde and Mrunal Thakur in the lead roles. David began developing the movie with Tips Films in December 2023, reuniting with his son Varun for their fourth collaboration. The project was officially announced in July 2024, with principal photography commencing shortly after, currently taking place across Mumbai, Goa, Rishikesh and Scotland. The music is composed by the duo Sachinâ€“Jigar and cinematography is handled by Ayananka Bose. Hai Jawani Toh Ishq Hona Hai is scheduled to be released worldwide on 10 April 2026. == Cast == * Varun Dhawan * Pooja Hegde * Mrunal Thakur * Maniesh Paul * Jimmy Sheirgill * Chunky Panday * Mouni Roy * Ali Asgar * Rajesh Kumar * Rakesh Bedi * Kubbra Sait == References ==
title: Hai Jawani Toh Ishq Hona Hai
